ARABIC: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The kingdom of the heavens and earth belongs to Allah and Allah is the final destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For God's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and the returning is to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The kingdom of the heavens and the earth belongs to Allah alone, and all shall have to return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and to Him do all things return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And for Allah only is the kingship of the heavens and the earth; and towards Allah is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Allah belongs the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the eventual coming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To God belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and to Him is the homecoming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth, and unto Allah is the journeying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and to God shall all things return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah's is the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and unto Allah is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and toward Allah is the destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yea, to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; and to Allah is the final goal (of all).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Allah belongs the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the return (of all).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. To Him is the arrival.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to God is the ultimate return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:42] And to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, the treasuries of rain, provision and vegetation, and with God is the journey’s end, the [final] return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Unto Allah belongeth the sovereignty) the storehouses (of the heavens) rain (and the earth) vegetation, (and unto Allah is the journeying) the return after death.
